title: "Plotting_results"
output: html_document

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

Loading needed packages and sources
```{r}
library(pacman)
p_load(ggplot2, tidyverse, wesanderson)
source("functions/Plotting.R")
```

Loading data and preparing it
```{r}
files <- list.files(path = "~/Uni/Bachelor/Data/Bachelor/class_reports", 
                    pattern = "*.csv",
                    full.names = F)

all_data <- files %>%
  map_df(prepare_file)
```


Plotting the results
```{r}
#Gemaps
all_data %>% subset(Featureset == "gemaps") %>% 
  plot_performance(title = "GeMAPS DK")

#egemaps
all_data %>% subset(Featureset == "egemaps") %>% 
  plot_performance(title = "eGeMAPS DK")
```
